ğŸ’°Pika World Daily Review â€“ 14 Sept 2022ğŸ—½ğŸ’£Inflation is scorching once moreğŸ”«The stock market suffered a rout as inflation figures came in higher than expected. This gives the Fed pull the engine to step on the pedal of lifting the interest rate. The sell-off deepens as the trading continues.The past optimism of the inflation peak suddenly evaporated as market participants were nervous about the Fedâ€™s tightening cycle. The falling price pressure appeared to be pretty short-lived.Some analysts are betting on even a full percentage rate hike increase. It will be an unprecedented move. The 2-year Treasury yield responded soundly as it hit a 3.75% high. The US Dollar Index naturally move higher as higher bond yield makes holding the greenback more attractive  pulling global capital to the dollar.ğŸ¯Cracks are forming in the marketğŸ’¸Indeed  as Pika World continue to DCA into an index fund  we are also mindful that the worst might not be over yet. Yesterday saw S&P 500 falling below its 50-day moving average as traders appear to be less confident in purchasing stocks at the current price level. It almost reached the 3900 level  where buyers were seen to step in and push the index higher.ğŸ•¹Producer Price Index (PPI) up nextğŸ”­Today we will also receive an essential fundamental indicator of Inflation: the PPI. On Friday  we will also gain insight into Michiganâ€™s consumer sentiment survey. These are critical data to help us map out the possibility of underlying inflation strength and consumersâ€™ responses to them.Indeed  the PPI is somewhat a forwarder indicator as it shows the change in the price of products by manufacturer  and it could directly feed into the end price sold to consumers. Inflation appears to have also been spread toward other spectrums of the economy  such as services which is a worrying sign as they could be stickier.âœï¸Whatâ€™s on the menu today?ğŸ“¦At 8.30 pm  we will receive the monthly Core PPI for August. On a monthly basis  we expect a decline of 0.1%  a much smaller decline from the fall of 0.5% in the prior period.It is 14 Sept  Wednesday  at 9 am in Singapore and 9 pm in New York. The market is in a risk-off mood again  and Pika World wishes all friends a safe trading week ahead!
